products.title: 01. La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavour.

products.title: 02. El Tigre
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavour of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with carmel.

products.title: 03. La Cucaracha
products.description: Sweet and intense witha big amount of different flavours. Carmel, grapes, strawberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days.

textInfo.content: Who are we? Just a bunch of friends with a love for a good coffee and desire to create something new, something original.
Our coffees reflect us - young, wild and free. We are on journey of new tastes...
